summary: Craft and improve an Ebony cuirass
descriptionHtml:
Create an Ebony armor cuirass which use Ebony mail vanilla meshes and textures.

The armor has no shader effect
The armor has no enchantment
The armor is craftable
The armor could be temper

No level list or vendor list the only way to get it is to use the recipe at the forge.
Need the Ebony perk smithing.

If you use Scaling formula amor rate mod (Requiem etc...) load my mod before.
V1.5 use a personal path for meshes and textures --> you could use any other mod concerning Ebony Mail without conflict. Come with a .bsa

Manual install:
Extract archive in skyrim folder

Auto install:
Use NMM :)

Sorry for crappy English, i'm french.

Regards

Credits
TES Edit
Construction Set
Skyrim nexus
NifSkope
author: Meriendil
